name: COBCOE Ltd
goal:
COBCOE is the membership organisation for British chambers of commerce and business associations in Europe. Our members are located in most European countries and represent some 12,000 businesses.

An independent, not for profit organisation, COBCOE works with members, affiliates and partners to advance international trade and business.
interests: Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Internal Market, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: Trade and Investment, Finance and business growth. Business environment, competitiveness, regulations and skills. Digital transformation and disruptive technologies
